label: 郷
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: township, originally a unit in the codal provincial administrative system, province (kuni)  district (gun)  township (gō)  subtownship (ho). In later classical and medieval times townships and subtownships functioned much like villages.
